trait.name: Keen Smell
text: The roachling scout has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Resistant
text: The roachling scout has advantage on Constitution saving throws.

trait.name: Stealthy Traveler
text: The roachling scout can move stealthily while traveling at a normal pace.

trait.name: Unlovely
text: The roachling scout has disadvantage on Charisma (Performance) and Charisma (Persuasion) checks in interactions with non-roachlings.

action.name: Multiattack
text: The roachling scout makes two begrimed shortsword attacks or two begrimed dart attacks.

action.name: Begrimed Shortsword
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) poison damage.

action.name: Begrimed Dart
text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, range 20/60 ft., one target. 6 (1d4 + 4) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) poison damage.
